name: Swirl Infosystems
overview: Swirl specializes in smart card applications and has solutions to some of the healthcare industry’s biggest concerns. We give healthcare payors and providers the ability to streamline the process of conducting routine medical transactions with smart card technology. The advantages of smart card technology are so compelling that several European countries have made smart cards the centerpiece of national healthcare reform efforts. Smart card provides security, information storage, identification, authentication, data storage and application processing. Swirlâ€™s’ mission is to provide our customers with cost-effective smart card and its services.
